About Us
Blue Giraffe Island Bar & Grill
is a vibrant, family-owned gem nestled in the heart of Sanibel Island since 2016. Located at
2075 Periwinkle Way (#14)
in Periwinkle Place, we’re your go-to spot for island-inspired American cuisine across all dayparts—breakfast, lunch, dinner, late-night bites, and special events.
Our Story
Started by local islanders who wanted to bring fresh, flavorful, and fun dining to Sanibel, Blue Giraffe quickly became known for turning ordinary BLTs, burgers, and tacos into uniquely delicious creations that stand out
.
When Hurricane Ian hit in 2022, we rose to the challenge. We pivoted to a food-truck model, helping pave the way for island food-truck permitting. In March 2025, we triumphantely reopened our brick-and-mortar location—this time bigger and better. Under new ownership by Michael Puente, with mentorship from founder Bill Letendre, we rebuilt from the ground up, added an adjacent storefront, and introduced an inviting modern space featuring a local artist’s giraffe mural, blue epoxy flooring, and artful nods to our original style
What We Offer
All‑Day Menu
: Classic island‑inspired dishes for every meal—breakfast omelettes, fresh salads, creative burgers, seafood tacos, and more.
Full Bar & Happy Hour
: Sip specialty cocktails, wine, or cold beer daily. Enjoy Happy Hour from 4–6 pm at Periwinkle Place.
Late‑Night Bites & Events
: Stay tuned—late-night dining and special events are in the works.
Pet‑Friendly Patio:
Bring your furry friends—our patio is pet-friendly and perfect for island chill times.
What Our Guests Say
“Fantastic food, arguably the best on the island… Not just another BLT or mahi taco, it’s their own. Their ingredients are fresh and you can tell the difference.”
– Ryan Goodmanson
“Split a burger… bun was fresh and hamburger melted in mouth… service was also excellent.”
– Chuck P
“Best place on the island… great food and the service is excellent!!!!!”
– Pandora Figley
